item.description:
Swing into fall at the September Meetup. Details to be announced! NOTE NEW DATE: Saturday, 9/25 (rather than Sunday, 9/26) in NATICK, rather than Needham.

Swap #1: Puzzles (one possibility: cards actually cut into puzzle pieces)
Swap #2: Use crayons on your cards (based on activities above or on your own use of crayons)

Activity: Watercolor demo - Pat and Tam will lead this month's activity showing you how to use watercolors for ATCs.

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: September 2010 NE ATC+ Meetup--NOTE new date (SAT. 9/25) and place (NATICK)
